title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. - Addendum 3 – Reality Check
description:
May 9, 2019 / Susan, Amelia and Megan Kenny, a co-founder of Open Justice Baltimore and a member of #TeamKeith, discuss the third episode of "The State vs. Keith Davis Jr" -- including the officers' disparate statements and why it's totally believable that the gun in the garage could have been planted by the police.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Linzess and Audible.

www.OhMyGut.info/Podcast

www.Audible.com/UNDISCLOSEDHEADS or text UNDISCLOSEDHEADS to 500-500

#undisclosed #udaddendum #freekeithdavisjr
